title: Vice Chief Executive Officer
blurb: Supporting organizational leadership, coordinating technical initiatives, and helping drive student engagement in networking and cybersecurity activities.

title: Head of Engineering
blurb: Leading technical teams, overseeing engineering projects, and guiding members in developing practical engineering and problem-solving skills.

title: Cybersecurity Cadet

title: Backend Developer

title: Technical Member
blurb: Supporting technical operations and contributing to hands-on projects, system development, and engineering initiatives within the organization.
